short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opus Task Planner is a vibrant and satisfying way to prioritize your tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opus Task Planner

Bring clarity to quality

Prioritize your tasks in an easy to use, minimalistic task planner that lets you open your tasks in the browser itself. No need for a long complicated sign up process. 

Opus Task Planner automatically organizes your tasks based on their deadlines and allows you to customize the deadline and title of your tasks.

- Boost your productivity by bringing clarity to your tasks!
- Add a task to your planner in the browser!
- Automatically organizes your tasks for you by their deadline!
